channel.title: How a software work without Tor?
channel.description: Things like apt-get would reach Tor first , is it a newly install software directly reach the Internet?

item.title: How a software work without Tor?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Actually, that’s mostly undocumented / unsupported and quite difficult to figure out if you are not a technical person.

Whonix

Unsupported

What do you mean by unsupported?

Read full topic
item.source: How a software work without Tor?

item.title: How a software work without Tor?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
zenose:

I have a local proxy in my host, so I think it doesn’t work to guest os, how to tunnel the Tor through proxy without installing?

Generally, see:

Whonix

Tunnels/Introduction

Instructions on how to combine tunnels (VPN, SSH, proxy) with Tor. (User -> Tor -> proxy/VPN/SSH -> Internet) (User -> proxy/VPN/SSH ->...

Specifically, see:

Whonix

Tunnels/Connecting to a proxy before Tor

Instructions on how to connect to a proxy before Tor (User -> proxy -> Tor -> Internet)

Read full topic
item.source: How a software work without Tor?

item.description:

item.title: How a software work without Tor?
item.dc:creator: zenose
item.description:
[quote=“Ego, post:5, topic:3437, full:true”]
Good day,

You shouldn’t install things in the Gateway. There is no advantage in doing that.

Updates done via apt-get in the Gateway go through Tor as well though.

Have a nice day,

Ego
[/quote]It is just the way installing VPN package in Gateway?

Read full topic

item.title: How a software work without Tor?
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
How a software work without Tor?

As it has always worked? The only thing Tor (in the Whonix model) changes is it transparently anonymizes traffic from any software installed in the workstation whenever it connects to the network.

Read full topic
item.source: How a software work without Tor?

item.title: How a software work without Tor?
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

I’m not certain what you are asking. Connections are however only possible via Tor, even for software just installed on the Workstation.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
